page.title: 05Farming in Skelmanthorpe
page.content: {Hopstrines Farm}owned by T.Hinchliffe. Fully mechanised. 9 employees. Dairy farm 300 acres, 100% pasture (silage). 150 heifers, 150 replacement Friesian heifers.1000gals milk per cow per 300 days approx. Milked at 5am and 3.30pm in a milking parlour. All own milk plus milk bought from Milk Marketing Board bottled and sold as 67% green top (unpasteurised), 33% pasteurised (by new equipment).{Mount Pleasant {Farm}owned by R. Shaw. Dairy/Beef. 80 Friesians, 40 Limousin cattle. Fully mechanised. 3 employees. Door to door deliveries of 60gals Green top, extra 200gals to Milk Marketing Board.{ {Ponker Farm.}206 acres mixed.Fully mechanised. 1/3 arable, 2/3 pasture.60 heifers, 50 young Friesians. 160 gals per day. 60 acres barley,10 acres hay, 25 acres silage. 160 beef cattle sold at 1 year old. 300 hens eggs.
